reviews.title: Worst hotel Ever
reviews.text: Worst Disgusting hotel ever been. I stay there for 6 days and I will never ever go their again even if its free. They have hidden fees if you invite some of you friends in you room at night, even if they stay for a few hours, the room are disgusting with fresh paint smells and you cannot open the windows because of the airplane noise they have lock the windows. Every 1 minutes a plain comes and go and the location is in the middle of no where. To top it all off they over charge me for a night, the internet prices are unbelievable high. I just hate that place so much if I was rich , I pay them to close that place. So you might get a good rate if you stay their but trust me , it does not worth the money.

Had to stay overnight in Dubai for business purpose so I stayed in Deira Sheraton. Its good place to stay if you have a meeting around the exhibition centre area. The hotel was good but I felt it was more suited for business type. The food was excellent and the service offered by the hotel was good. They have a good bar if you want to catch up with some drinks but beware of company.
reviews.title: Fine for a business stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice room but we HAD paid for a Suite. The Club room was kinda average that my mum stayed in. Decent breakfast. Not too good location but cheap taxis. They did that annoying thing where if you prepay they hold the money and then make you pay on departure. So you pay twice untill the release first payment. Plus, the exchange rate in the hotel was terrible so it was more expensive than the price I booked it in the UK. This was using their own site so be careful. Expensive food and drink but, hey, it's a hotel. Prostitutes in the bars and wondering about so maybe not a good idea if you are religious etc. I didn't find it too alarming but they did make my aunty feel a bit uncomfortable giving her "dirty looks" when she went in alone before we met her. VERY loud disco till past 3am and we were on the other side and 3 floors up... No sleep possible. At all. Even midweek. Even after complaints.
reviews.title: Nice room but loud disco all night (and morning) and prostitutes! Stay somewhere else

reviews.text: We got a free lift to the airport as we complained... Not really making up for it.
reviews.title: perfect...absolutely perfecf!!

reviews.text: if there was a 6 star distinction, i would give it to this hotel. i had reservations at this hotel for 4 nights and then on to another resort which was reportedly better than this one..but it wasn't and after 1 night i called and asked to return to the Sheraton Diera! i cannot think of one complaint...and i am a very fussy person! you can get food/service 24/7 and the prices are very reasonable... the location is great if you like to go out and walk around and feel safe... as a single woman traveling alone, this was very important to me. i will definitely return here and would recommend the Sheraton Diera without reservation...
reviews.title: Excellent for Business

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for one night on a stopver and can really recommend it. The first impressions are excellant with check in being faultless and a connceriege team ( there seems to be half a dozen of them ) only too pleased to help you move in.
reviews.title: Excellant Stopover Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel rooms all face an internal courtyard which contains the breakfast restaurant which is nice, the rooms themselves are very smart with very modern fixtures.
reviews.title: Decent hotel, wrong location

reviews.text: The hotel has a smallish rooftop pool and good sunbathing area, the gym is excellant with a good selection of machines.
reviews.title: Business hotel showing its age

reviews.text: The hotel is located within a short tax ride ( 12Dhs ) from all the malls and other bars so the location is good, there is one issue with noise from planes going overhead but not bad enough to keep you awake.
reviews.title: COMPLETE PERFECTION, 100% SATISFACTION

reviews.text: The buffest breakfast is nice, some real bacon and pork sausages would have been nice but I guess you cant have everything..
reviews.title: High service and friendly people in good location
very good
reviews.text: we stayed there for 2 nights and it was wonderful..i would defo recommend that to asnyone..the only thing that was bad was it was far from other hotels and attarctions...but good value for money

If you have a choice then choose a different hotel - the staff try really hard and I was very impressed with the service but it is just a noisy place - walls like paper - I could hear other guests all night talking, walking past and hear phones and alarms all morning.
reviews.title: choose somewhere else

reviews.text: One tip for the ladies is a great beauty salon across the road - look for the pink sign - amazingly cheap waxing, threading and manipedi! tell them I said hello!
reviews.title: Don't do it

reviews.text: For Dubai I think the price is too high for what you get!
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.text: As nice as the staff are at this hotel (they tried hard to please) it just doesn't offer good value.
reviews.title: excellent staff, excellent service, excellent value = excellent holiday!!

reviews.text: The Sheraton Deira is in an older section of town within a short drive from the airport. It is a rather small and ordinary hotel, but certainly consistent with the standards of other Sheratons I have visited. The hotel staff is friendly and helpful, and there is a tour desk that can arrange local sight-seeing trips.
reviews.title: Not bad for a short business trip

reviews.text: The room was comfortable and clean, and wireless Internet service is reliable but somewhat costly. The business center is very small, with only two working computers that were occupied whenever I arrived. On each occasion, I had to sit and wait before I could get access, so this facility I found to be quite inadequate.
reviews.title: Fabulous Staff

reviews.text: There is only one restaurant in the hotel and staff usually tried to steer me to the buffet that was available at each meal time. At lunch and dinner, an a la carte menu is available, but I found it to be fairly limited. Food quality seemed to be okay, though.
reviews.title: Simply put, this is a great hotel.
Great Experience
reviews.text: If I were returning to Dubai for a short business trip, I would consider the Sheraton Deira, but tourists might want to look for other options.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent a superb 10 days in this hotel. The rooms are really nice and although being on the flight path into Dubai noise is minimised due to the double glazing.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel-highly recommended
